sentences: In the decision (FCCC/CP/2004/L.17), the COP requests the GEF to, inter alia, report on the support of activities identified in the Buenos Aires Programme of Work on Adaptation and Response Measures and continue to fund activities relating to UNFCCC Article 6 (education, training and public awareness).
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
